titles.title: To require the Secretary of Transportation to appoint a representative from the Department of Transportation to the board of trustees of the Gateway Program Development Corporation.
Get on Board to Fix the Tunnel Act
Get on Board to Fix the Tunnel Act
Get on Board to Fix the Tunnel Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Railroads, Pipelines, and Hazardous Materials.

bill.summary:
Get on Board to Fix the Tunnel Act
This bill directs the Department of Transportation to appoint a representative to the board of trustees of the Gateway Program Development Corporation.
